name: Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures
summary: Star Wars: Clone Wars Adventures was a Star Wars–themed massively multiplayer online game developed by Sony Online Entertainment.

esrb.synopsis:
This is an online action game in which players control characters from the Clone Wars animated TV series. The game allows players to interact with characters in an open-world environment and engage in a variety of mini-games—puzzles, matching tasks, space shooters, piloting spacecraft, tower defense. Some of the shooting mini-games depict laser gunfire and explosions; the tower-defense mini-game allows players to build structures and drop mines to destroy invading driod units; another mini-game involves controlling human characters that spar with light sabers. In a stunt mini-game, players can launch an alien into large piles of dung, which is accompanied by splat sounds and flies overhead.

Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB (Windows PC, Web Browser)
